mainMenu.name: Shahmirze Mammadyarli
mainMenu.work: I'm a designer & developer with a passion for web design. I enjoy developing simple, clean and slick websites that provide real value to the end user. Thousands of clients have procured exceptional results while working with me. Delivering work within time and budget which meets client's requirements is our moto.

contact1.title: Let's get in touch
contact1.text: I enjoy discussing new projects and design challenges. Please share as much info, as possible so we can get the most out of our first catch-up.
